column4: anyone knows how to format compaq presario v3500 using usb flash?
I selected usb as 1st boot device
and installed uvbuntu iso on usb
how did you transfer the ISO to the USB device?
ok, did you MD5 test the ISO before using it?
did you check the ISO you downloaded before transferring to the USB device?
ok what happens when you try to boot?
sdoes the system say the device isn't bootable, do you just get a black screen?
ok then it is booting, you just need the nomodeset boot option
its not bios, the bios is doing its job, its a video issue
if you get a black screen at boot, you need the boot option
